name: Moody Emojis
description:
I created this game for the  No Code Jam.

Controls are simple, A and D keys to move left and right and space to shoot the happy Emoji.

This is the first time I've made a game using the drag and drop feature in GMS2. I'm not going to lie and say it was easy, but it didn't take long to make. I'm more used to working with code but I managed to slap this querky game together with just 17 hours left in the game jam.
